mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES( SEQ_MEMBER.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{RRN}, #{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{hp}, SYSDATE, 1000000)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT RPAD(SUBSTR(ID,1,2),LENGTH(ID),'*') AS ID FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PASSWORD = #{password} WHERE ID = #{id} AND EMAIL = #{email}
UPDATE MEMBER SET CASH = (SELECT CASH - #{minusCash} FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}) WHERE ID = #{id}
